Rulings.Edison: ●Discarding 1 Spell Card is a cost to activate Type Zero Magic Crusher's Ignition effect.
Rulings.Tengu: ●Discarding 1 Spell Card is a cost to activate Type Zero Magic Crusher's Ignition-like effect.
Rulings.Goat:
●Type Zero Magic Crusher’s” effect is an activated effect. 
● Spell Cards discarded for another purpose may not be used for the effect of “Type Zero Magic Crusher.”
●Q: Can a player use the effect of “Type Zero Magic Crusher” during the opponent’s turn? 
A: Yes they can activate the effect of Type Zero Magic Crusher during the opponent's turn.
